tasks.title: Performing Voodoo curse
tasks.description: Voodoo is about balance, healing, and connection with spirits (Loa), and people often seek guidance, healing, or protection rather than harm.

tasks.title: Complete Project Report
tasks.description: Finish writing the final report for the ongoing project and review it before submission.

tasks.title: Grocery Shopping
tasks.description: Buy groceries for the week, including fresh vegetables, fruits, and household items.

tasks.title: Doctor Appointment
tasks.description: Attend a scheduled appointment with the general physician for a routine check-up.

tasks.title: Team Meeting
tasks.description: Join the weekly team meeting to discuss project progress, challenges, and goals.

tasks.title: Attend Yoga Class
tasks.description: Participate in the weekly yoga session for relaxation and flexibility.

tasks.title: Book Flights for Vacation
tasks.description: Search for and book flights for the upcoming vacation trip.

tasks.title: Review Client Proposal
tasks.description: Review and provide feedback on the proposal draft for a new client project.

tasks.title: Prepare Presentation for Board Meeting
tasks.description: Create and organize slides for the upcoming presentation to the board of directors.

tasks.title: Organize Team Training Session
tasks.description: Schedule and coordinate a team training session on new software tools.

tasks.title: Update Project Timeline
tasks.description: Revise the project timeline to reflect the latest developments and deadlines.

tasks.title: Client Follow-Up Call
tasks.description: Contact the client to follow up on recent discussions and ensure they are satisfied with the services.

tasks.title: Write and Submit Weekly Status Report
tasks.description: Write the weekly status report on all ongoing tasks and submit it to the project manager.

tasks.title: Update Company Website Content
tasks.description: Revise and update content on the company website to reflect new product offerings.

tasks.title: Visit Parents
tasks.description: Spend the weekend visiting parents and catching up with family.

tasks.title: Clean the House
tasks.description: Do a deep cleaning of the house, including dusting, vacuuming, and organizing.

notes.title: Urgent: Project Deadline
notes.description: The project deadline has been moved up by a week. Make sure all tasks are completed on time.

notes.title: Team Meeting Reminder
notes.description: Reminder: The weekly team meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM. Don't forget to prepare updates.

notes.title: Lunch Break
notes.description: Lunch break from 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM. Remember to take a break and recharge!

notes.title: Client Feedback Received
notes.description: Client provided feedback on the proposal. We need to revise the document and send it back.

notes.title: New Employee Onboarding
notes.description: New team member starts next week. Prepare onboarding materials and welcome package.

notes.title: System Maintenance
notes.description: Scheduled system maintenance will occur on Saturday from 2 AM to 4 AM. Ensure all work is saved beforehand.
